org.opengrok.indexer.analysis

Interface Xrefer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Resettable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JFlexNonXref, JFlexXref, MandocXref, TroffXref

    public interface Xrefer
extends Resettable
    Represents an API for lexers that write a cross-reference document.
